scripts.api: cd api && cargo watch -w ./src/ -- cargo run
scripts.web: mv Cargo.toml Cargo.toml.bak && cp Cargo.web.toml Cargo.toml && dx serve --hot-reload
scripts.android: mv Cargo.toml Cargo.toml.bak && cp Cargo.mobile.toml Cargo.toml && cargo android run
scripts.desktop: mv Cargo.toml Cargo.toml.bak && cp Cargo.desktop.toml Cargo.toml && dx serve --platform desktop --hot-reload
scripts.build:web: mv Cargo.toml Cargo.toml.bak && cp Cargo.web.toml Cargo.toml && dx build --platform web --release
scripts.build:android: mv Cargo.toml Cargo.toml.bak && cp Cargo.mobile.toml Cargo.toml && cargo android apk build --release --split-per-abi
scripts.build:desktop: mv Cargo.toml Cargo.toml.bak && cp Cargo.desktop.toml Cargo.toml && WEBKIT_DISABLE_COMPOSITING_MODE=1 dx bundle --platform desktop --release
